inn1.comm: drifts to the pads ,tucked down to fine-leg region
stays back to push this length delivery to the cover region
Boom! he shuffled towards off, cleared the front foot, opened his stance and swung the full-length delivery over square-leg boundary.
gets forward to defend this to the off side
full and around off stump, driven uppishly but it falls short of mid-off. Catch it was the cry but that didn't carry
banged in short, not much pace on that, pulled away to deep midwicket fielder for a single
lovely delivery, that lands on a good length outside off stump and seams away past the defensive push and rushes past the outside edge
fuller, tilting in towards middle and off, tapped to the on side
is squared up as he pushes a delivery that straightens around the off stump to point region
pushes this down the leg side for a wide
Thump! Lovely pull shot. He swiveled quickly to pull the short delivery over midwicket. Fluent swing of the bat
ooh!  It cut in from outside off stump and Shehzad left it on the length and it bounced just past the off stump.

fuller in length, on the middle and leg, Shehzad flicks it neatly past square-leg. Guptill gives chase and puts in a dive and even flicks the ball from the ropes but it eventually rolls over the line along with him
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
stays back to tap this short-of-length delivery to right of mid-on for a single
slips in a slower one on the middle and leg, worked around to fine-leg region
Crashed! Gentle full delivery floated outside off and he leans across to square drive it through cover point.
slower one, tries to work it to the on side but doesn't connect properly
Thump and dive! Shehzad reaches out to thump a short of length delivery to left of cover where Guptil makes an acrobatic save
leans forward to tap this to the on side

jags back in from outside off and Hafeez was initially on the front foot; he then tried to press back and ended up caught at the crease and pushing outside the line of the delivery. The ball hit high on the thigh pad
straightens outside off, left alone
leans forward to defend a full-length delivery to cover
extra bounce .. kicks up from just short of length and Hafeez is beaten, trying to push the ball to point.

more trouble for Hafeez. This one cuts in from outside off, from good length, Hafeez stabs it off the inside edge to square-leg. He initially ambles across and is made to hurry in the end by the throw
stays back to push this delivery to backward point region
This man is in some hurry. He gets on the front foot to whack a short-of-length delivery on the up and over wide mid-on.
